translationHelp.title: How to Use
translationHelp.description1: Read posts with original and translation stacked vertically. Switch the view with the floating controller at the bottom.
translationHelp.description2: Click a translation line to open the panel and vote or add your own. Higher points translation will be displayed at the top.

TextStatusGuide.title: Text Status Guide
TextStatusGuide.humanTouchedDescription: At least one translation option has 1 or more likes.
TextStatusGuide.proofreadDescription: All translation options have at least 1 like.
TextStatusGuide.validatedDescription: All translation options have at least 2 likes.

CookieConsent.title: Allow cookies?
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to provide and improve Evame.
